mapper.select:
SELECT a.product_sn productSn, a.name, a.id, c.type FROM dj_basics_product_template a, dj_basics_goods c WHERE a.goods_id=c.id AND c.type IN(2,3,5)
AND a.worker_type_id=#{workerTypeId}
AND ( a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.product_sn LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') )
AND a.city_id=#{cityId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dj_skill_certification b WHERE a.id = b.prod_template_id AND b.skill_certification_id=#{skillCertificationId} )

select sp.id as storefrontProductId, p.id as id, IFNULL(sp.market_name,p.name) as name, p.goods_id as goodsId, p.category_id as categoryId, p.product_sn as productSn, sp.image as image, p.unit_id as unitId, p.label_id as labelId, p.unit_name as unitName, p.type as type, sp.sell_price as price, p.istop, p.value_id_arr AS valueIdArr, p.value_name_arr AS valueNameArr, hw.shop_count AS shopCount, hw.ask_count AS askCount, hw.back_count AS backCount, hw.work_back AS workBack, hw.receive, hw.repair_count AS repairCount, hw.ask_count AS askCount, hw.rep_time AS repTime, hw.back_time AS backTime, hw.storefront_id AS storefrontId, hw.owner_back AS ownerBack FROM dj_basics_product_template p INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods g ON p.goods_id = g.id
INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods_category ca ON ca.id = p.category_id
INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront_product sp ON p.id=sp.prod_template_id
INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods_category tca ON tca.id = ca.parent_top
INNER JOIN dj_house_warehouse hw ON hw.product_id=sp.id WHERE p.data_status = 0 AND hw.house_id= #{houseId} AND hw.product_type= #{productType} AND g.type = #{productType}
AND ( CONCAT( IFNULL(g.other_name,''), ca.`name`, IFNULL(tca.`name`,''), p.`name`, IFNULL(p.value_name_arr,'') ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') )
AND (ca.parent_top=#{categoryId} OR ca.id=#{categoryId})
ORDER BY p.istop DESC,p.`name` DESC
